name: Tap The Light
description:
Test your vision and brain! Find the light-colored tile and tap it as quickly as you can. 

Features:
- Easy to learn
- Unlimited levels
- Fascinating music
- Save your high score automatically
- Exercise your brain
- Completely free, no in-app purchase

Words from players
- Super fun and addictive! It's my go-to game on my phone. 
- It's easy and fun for all ages and it's a great time passer.
- As fun as Tap the white tile
- I archieved level 157, still playing hard
